title: Best Nob Hill Date Night Spots

short_description: Are you looking for the Best Nob Hill Date Night Spots? We have some great suggestions that are all walking distance to our Nob Hill hotel.
long_description:
Are you looking for the Best Nob Hill Date Night Spots? We have some great suggestions that are all walking distance to our Nob Hill hotel.

 

 

If you are looking for the best date night spots in Nob Hill, read on! Here are some great suggestions for a date night spot. The historic Nob Hill district of San Francisco is full of beautiful architecture and romantic spots that make for the perfect date night. We love these spots for their convenient location, friendly service, and  

 

Drinks & a Movie

Sometimes the best dates are the most low-key. Enjoy a drink in our hotel lobby, yes, we have Hangar One Vodka on Tap, and then relax in our comfy #NodHill beds and stream some movies with our incredibly fast wi-fi.

 

Venticello & Cable Car Ride

Three blocks north-west of the hotel is Venticello. A small and intimate Nob Hill favorite with delicious Italian cuisine. Venticello is committed to showcasing local, fresh ingredients sourced from the Bay Area. Everything on our menu, from the breads and pastas to the mozzarella and gelato, are made in-house. After dinner hop on a cable car for a twilight ride.

 

Nob Hill Cafe & Huntington Park

Two blocks north-west of the hotel is Nob Hill Cafe. We suggest you order a pizza to go and sit in Huntington Park and have a little picnic on a bench.

 

Another Cafe & Video Games at Soda Popsinski

In the mood for chatting over coffee? Head to Another Cafe on Pine and Hyde. Our favorite things about Another Cafe include: indoor and outdoor seating, delicious coffee from local company Bicycle Coffee, good food, and they are open until 10:00pm. After a cup of joe, head to Soda Popsinski on California Street to show off your chops at a little old school Mario Bros. on their Nintendo and big screen tv.

 

See more of our favorite date night spots on Instagram!
